details.formulaStrippedArticleTitle: Improved method for synthetic aperture radar scattered wave deception jamming
details.title: Improved method for synthetic aperture radar scattered wave deception jamming
details.standardTitle: Improved method for synthetic aperture radar scattered wave deception jamming
details.abstract: This study presents an improved scattered wave jamming method for synthetic aperture radar (SAR). The jammer adjusts the time-delay and the phase of the intercepted SAR signal. Then, a false scene is created to provide an effective protection for a certain area. It requires a lower jamming power than barrage jamming and has less computational complexity than direct-path deception jamming. Based on the performance analysis of scattered wave jamming, pulse repetition intervals to delay retransmission, and a modulation centre shift are proposed as improvements to enlarge the jamming area.

ieee.displayText: Yongcai Liu, Wei Wang, Xiaoyi Pan, Qixiang Fu, Guoyu Wang, "Inverse Omega-K Algorithm for the Electromagnetic Deception of Synthetic Aperture Radar", Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing IEEE Journal of, vol. 9, pp. 3037-3049, 2016, ISSN 1939-1404.
ieee.title: Inverse Omega-K Algorithm for the Electromagnetic Deception of Synthetic Aperture Radar

ieee.title: Novel noise jamming for countering ISAR based on pseudo-random serials phase-modulation

ieee.displayText: Mohamed Barbary, Peng Zong, "Novel Anti-Stealth on Sub-Nyquist Scattering Wave Deception Jammer With Stratospheric Balloon-Borne Bistatic Radar Using KA-STAP-FTRAB Algorithm", Sensors Journal IEEE, vol. 15, pp. 6437-6453, 2015, ISSN 1530-437X.
ieee.title: Novel Anti-Stealth on Sub-Nyquist Scattering Wave Deception Jammer With Stratospheric Balloon-Borne Bistatic Radar Using KA-STAP-FTRAB Algorithm

ieee.title: Coherent noise jamming to de-chirping radar

ieee.title: Influence of Estimate Error of Radar Kinematic Parameter on Deceptive Jamming Against SAR
